Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 6/13/1985 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/26/1989, off Fernando Valenzuela (LAD)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/14/1989, off Randy Johnson (CHC)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against St. Louis on 9/27/1989...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Cincinnati on 6/21/1990...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/1991, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won World Series with San Diego in 1991...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,907,143 through salary arbitration...
